description: This file contains functions for deploying a playground application, including creating a tar archive, uploading it, and managing deployment status panels with rich library. It orchestrates the deployment process with progress updates and error handling.

methods.name: create_deployment_info
methods.description: Creates a formatted Text object displaying deployment details such as app name, root path, elapsed time, status or error message.

methods.name: create_info_panel
methods.description: Creates a Panel containing deployment information for display.

methods.name: create_error_panel
methods.description: Creates a Panel indicating deployment failure with error details.

methods.name: create_tar_archive
methods.description: Creates a gzipped tar archive of the specified root directory.

methods.name: deploy_archive
methods.description: Deploys the tar archive to the cloud using an external deployment function.

methods.name: cleanup_archive
methods.description: Deletes the temporary tar archive after deployment.

methods.name: deploy_playground_app
methods.description: Main function to deploy a playground app: creates archive, uploads, cleans up, and manages progress display.
